summary: This mod adds a Dwemer Spider Automaton pet to Understone Keep in Markarth for Tinkerers, Dwemer Enthusiasts and Scholars of those ancient elves.
descriptionHtml:
This mod is both simple and my first, so if you encounter bugs, tell me so I can fix them. I ran around and took out a bandit camp with it and encountered no issues, but, just in case, feel free to PM or comment with issues, suggestions, and (hopefully) memes.

CHANGELOG:

author: Zayan Watchel
